fields.name: name
fields.description: A unique-to-the-job, human readable name for the job.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique identifier used for job monitoring and client-side pub/sub.

fields.name: tasks
fields.description: A list of tasks belonging to the job which should be executed.

fields.name: datasource
fields.description: Describes how to aquire input data for the first task in the chain.

fields.name: workflow
fields.description: Describes how tasks flow from one to another. Should be a list of two value vectors.
